betterquesting:10.desc:8:
This is the fourth and §elast tier§r of Ore Processing which outputs §apentuple the amount inputted§r. This is simply overkill, but worth it I'd say.

In order to process the ores in this tier, it's a ridiculously long process but since I'm a nice unemployed dude, I'll write it for you.

Firstly, you'll need to get some §6Sulfur§r. Once you got those, §ethrow them in a §6Chemical Oxidizer§r to get §6Sulfur Dioxide§r. After that, §einfuse the previous Sulfur Dioxide with §6Oxygen§r to make §6Sulfur Trioxide§r. 

For the next step, you'll need §6Water Vapor§r. To get the said vapor, you'll need to §eput Water in a §6Rotary Condensentrator§r (§7on mode Decondensentrator§r). 

Once you got the Water Vapor, §epipe it inside a §6Chemical Infuser§r together with the Sulfur Trioxide. This will now §emake §6Sulfuric Acid§r which we will then put in the §6Chemical Dissolution Chamber§r. This is where you'll put your ore in, then you'll get the §eOre's Slurry§r. We then now need to clean it by §eputting the Slurry into a §6Chemical Washer§r. 

After you did all that, §eput the Clean Slurry into a §6Chemical Crystallizer§r to get 5 Crystals. These crystals will then §ego into the §6Chemical Injection Chamber§r alongside §6Hydrogen Chloride§r to get shards. You already know the next steps so I'll leave you to it.
   
§n§lProsedure:§r
§7§nOre Processing:§r
1. Ore + §bSulfuric Acid§r  >  §6Chemical Dissolution Chamber§r  >  §bOre Slurry§r
2. §bOre Slurry§r  >  §6Chemical Washer§r  >  §bClean Ore Slurry§r
3. §bClean Ore Slurry§r  >  §6Chemical Crystallizer§r  >  Crystal
4. Crystal + §bHydrogen Chloride§r  >  §6C. Inj. Chamber§r  >  Shard
5. Shard + §bOxygen§r  >  §6Purification Chamber§r  >  Clump
6. Clump  >  §6Crusher§r  >  Dust
7. Dust  >  §6Energized Smelter§r  >  Ingot

§7§nHydrogen Chloride:§r
1.1.  §9Water§r  >  §6Electrolytic Seperator§r  >  [§e§lHydrogen§7 | Oxygen§r]
1.2.1. §9Water§r  >  §6TEP§r  >  §9Brine§r
1.2.2. §9Brine§r  >  §6Electrolytic Seperator§r  >  [§7Sodium | §e§lChlorine§r] 
2. §bHydrogen + Chlorine§r  >  §6Chemical Infuser§r  >  §bHydrogen Chloride§r

§7§nSulfuric Acid:§r
1.1. Sulfur  >  §6Chemical Oxidizer§r  >  §bSulfur Dioxide§r
1.2. §bSulfur Dioxide§r + §bOxygen§r  >  §6Chemical Infuser§r  >  §bSulfur Trioxide§r
1.3.1. §9Water§r  >  §6Rotary Condensentrator§r (§7Mode Decond.§r)  >  §bWater Vapor§r
1.3 §bSulfur Trioxide§r + §bWater Vapor§r  >  §6Chemical Infuser§r  >  §bSulfuric Acid
